profiles.name: Amara Okafor
profiles.title: Director of Digital Assets
profiles.ai_summary: Amara Okafor, Director of Digital Assets at the Abu Dhabi Sovereign Wealth Fund, oversees the strategic deployment of capital into innovative digital asset ventures. At Proof of Talk 2026, she is actively seeking opportunities to invest $200 million over the next 18 months in tokenised real-world assets and blockchain infrastructure, with a keen focus on regulated custody solutions and institutional-grade DeFi protocols. With full decision-making authority, Amara is particularly interested in startups that demonstrate regulatory clarity, possess audited smart contracts, and have established institutional partnerships, as well as exploring co-investment opportunities with other sovereign and pension funds.

profiles.name: Marcus Chen
profiles.title: CEO & Co-Founder
profiles.ai_summary: Marcus Chen is the CEO and Co-Founder of VaultBridge, a company specializing in institutional custody and settlement infrastructure for tokenized securities. At Proof of Talk 2026, he is actively seeking strategic investors who can offer more than just financial backing, as well as partnerships with exchanges and custodians. With $40M already raised in their Series B and live integrations with three European banks and two asset managers, Marcus holds significant decision-making authority and is particularly interested in connecting with Middle Eastern sovereign wealth funds exploring tokenization.

profiles.name: Dr. Elena Vasquez
profiles.title: General Partner
profiles.ai_summary: Dr. Elena Vasquez, General Partner at Meridian Crypto Ventures, leads a firm focused on investing in infrastructure that bridges traditional finance (TradFi) and decentralized finance (DeFi). At Proof of Talk 2026, she is actively seeking Series A-B companies demonstrating strong institutional traction, aligning with her investment thesis aimed at achieving a $500M AUM. With full decision-making authority, Dr. Vasquez is deal-ready and interested in identifying co-investors for larger rounds, as well as facilitating introductions between her portfolio companies and strategic partners.

profiles.name: James Whitfield
profiles.title: CTO
profiles.ai_summary: James Whitfield, the CTO of NexaLayer, leads a company specializing in enterprise blockchain solutions with a focus on Layer-2 scaling and compliance modules. At Proof of Talk 2026, he is actively seeking partnerships with regulated financial institutions, such as banks and asset managers, to pilot NexaLayer's enterprise-grade Layer-2 solutions that integrate robust KYC/AML capabilities. With decision-making authority, James is also exploring infrastructure partnerships to enhance cross-chain settlement, demonstrating a high level of deal-readiness and strategic intent.

profiles.name: Sophie Bergmann
profiles.title: Head of Digital Assets Innovation
profiles.ai_summary: Sophie Bergmann, Head of Digital Assets Innovation at Deutsche Bundesbank, leads initiatives in exploring central bank digital currency (CBDC) infrastructure and regulatory frameworks for tokenised securities under MiCA. At Proof of Talk 2026, she is actively seeking technology providers with compliance-first approaches, as well as academic collaborators and private sector partners interested in participating in regulatory sandbox environments. With significant decision-making authority, Sophie is prepared to engage in discussions and form strategic partnerships that align with Deutsche Bundesbank's innovation and regulatory objectives.

Amara Okafor.explanation: Amara Okafor is looking to deploy $200M into tokenised real-world assets and blockchain infrastructure, while Marcus Chen's VaultBridge offers institutional custody and settlement infrastructure for tokenised securities. With VaultBridge already integrated with European banks and asset managers, this presents a strategic investment opportunity for Amara, aligning with her focus on regulated custody solutions.

synergies: Middle Eastern sovereign wealth fund connections
